name: Shani Aarti
title: Shani Dev Aarti
description: A powerful aarti dedicated to Lord Shani (Saturn), the deity of justice and karma who rewards or punishes based on one's deeds. This aarti is performed to seek his blessings and mitigate negative effects.
significance: Invokes Lord Shani's blessings for justice, discipline, success through hard work, and protection from misfortune.

seo.description: Complete Shani Aarti with lyrics in Hindi and English, meaning, and significance. Learn the proper way to perform Lord Shani aarti.

sections.title: Lord Shani Aarti
sections.content: The Shani Aarti is a powerful devotional hymn that praises Lord Shani, the supreme dispenser of justice who governs karma and rewards based on one's deeds.

sections.title: Historical Significance
sections.content: This aarti has been sung for centuries by devotees seeking Shani's blessings. It is especially significant on Saturdays, the day sacred to Lord Shani.

sections.title: How to Perform the Aarti
sections.content: Proper method and rituals for performing Shani Aarti.

subsections.title: Preparation
subsections.content: Clean the worship area, arrange a thali with diya, black sesame seeds, mustard oil, and flowers. Place Shani idol or picture facing west.

subsections.title: Aarti Procedure
subsections.content: Offer black sesame seeds and mustard oil, light the diya, and perform the aarti with devotion while chanting 'Om Sham Shanicharaya Namah'.

sections.title: Spiritual Significance
sections.content: Understanding the deeper meaning and benefits of performing Shani Aarti.

subsections.title: Justice and Karma
subsections.content: The aarti helps in accepting the laws of karma and understanding divine justice.

subsections.title: Discipline and Success
subsections.content: Regular performance of this aarti brings discipline, hard work, and success through righteous means.
